div.p: â€”Distributions of methylation levels in the analyzed sites in the data. ( A) Mean methylation levels across time points per treatment. Error bars represent standard error of the mean. t-Test P values between groups were 1.57e-05, 3.268e-05, 3.268e-05, and 0.167 for time points 1, 2, 3, and 4, respectively, when calculated across all analyzed CpG sites. ( B) Histogram of mean methylation level across time points per CpG site.
